item.description:
Laughter yoga is a unique exercise routine, which combines unconditional laughter with yogic breathing. Anyone can laugh without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is initially simulated as a physical exercise while maintaining eye contact with others in the group and promoting childlike playfulness. In most cases this soon leads to real and contagious laughter. Current scientific evidence has shown that laughter not only improves our overall health, happiness and sense of well-being, but increases our life expectancy as well; here’s how 1. Laughter strengthens your immune system and promotes healing. 2. Laugher is good for your heart 3. Laughter may help to prevent type II diabetes 4. Laughter alleviates bronchitis and asthma 5. Laughter is an intense aerobic workout (1 minute of rigorous laughter, has been shown to have the same cardiovascular benefits as a 10-minute workout on a rowing machine. You can burn approximately 400 calories an hour just laughing) 6. Laughter is a great stress buster 7. Laughter is a natural painkiller 8. Laughter relieves depression, anxiety and additions 9. Laughter enhances brain functioning 10. Laughter is internal jogging 11. Laughter is a challenging abdominal workout 12. Laughter lifts your spirit and soothes your soul Laughter Yoga session starts with gentle warm-up techniques followed by laughter exercises and ending with “laughter meditation”. This session is open to all levels, no experience required. Dress comfortably and bring lots of water.

 

Please note we need a minimum of 6 people for this class.

group.name: The Light Within - Yoga, Reiki, Meditation - Dorchester MA

item.name: Laughter Yoga - The Best Stress Relief Option!
